DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: HENNI, A. A.;HENNI, ABDELMOUBINE AMAR;Amar Abdelmoubine Henni;Henni, Amar Abdelmoubine;HENNI, ABDELMOUBINE A.

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduao em Physique Thorique - Universit d'Oran Es-Senia (2001), mestrado em Physique Thorique - Universit d'Oran Es-Senia (2005) e doutorado em Geometria - International School for Advanced Studies (2009). Atualmente Professor Adjunto Na Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina. Tem experincia na rea de Matemtica, com nfase em Geometria Algbrica, atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas: Problemas de Moduli, Feixes instantons, Esquemas de Hilbert e Esquemas Quot de pontos e feixes perversos
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Bachelor's at Physique Thorique from Universit d'Oran Es-Senia (2001), master's at Physique Thorique from Universit d'Oran Es-Senia (2005) and doctorate at Geometria from International School for Advanced Studies (2009). Has experience in Mathematics, focusing on Algebric Geometry, acting on the following subjects: adhm construction, instantons, esquemas de hilbert dos pontos, perverse instantons and instanton.

ENDERECO-PROFISSIONAL.LOGRADOURO-COMPLEMENTO: Campus Universitrio Reitor Joo David Ferreira Lima, Departamento de Matemtica, sala 213, caixa 61

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: HENNI, A. A.;HENNI, ABDELMOUBINE AMAR;Amar Abdelmoubine Henni;Henni, Amar Abdelmoubine;HENNI, ABDELMOUBINE A.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: THE FLUX OF NONCOMMUTATIVE U(1) INSTANTON THROUGH THE FUZZY SPHERES
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO-INGLES: THE FLUX OF NONCOMMUTATIVE U(1) INSTANTON THROUGH THE FUZZY SPHERES

DETALHAMENTO-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-PERIODICO-OU-REVISTA: International Journal of Modern Physics A

AUTORES.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: HENNI, A. A.;HENNI, ABDELMOUBINE AMAR;Amar Abdelmoubine Henni;Henni, Amar Abdelmoubine;HENNI, ABDELMOUBINE A.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: From the ADHM construction on noncommutative $R_{\theta}^4$ we investigate different U(1) instanton solutions tied by isometry trasformations. These solutions present a form of vector fields in noncommutative $R_{\theta}^3$ vector space which makes possible the calculus of their fluxes through fuzzy spheres. We establish the noncommutative analog of Gauss theorem from which we show that the flux of the U(1) instantons through fuzzy spheres does not depend on the radius of these spheres and it is invariant under isometry transformations.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-ARTIGO.TITULO-DO-ARTIGO: MONADS FOR FRAMED TORSION-FREE SHEAVES ON MULTI-BLOW-UPS OF THE PROJECTIVE PLANE
ADHM CONSTRUCTION OF PERVERSE INSTANTON SHEAVES

On the fixed locus of framed instanton sheaveson -3
